players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we're all working together to identify the mafia among us."
You: "I'm not sure what happened to Diana, but I'll keep my guard up. Let's all stay vigilant and try to figure out who the mafia is."
Charlie: "I'm concerned that the mafia might try to manipulate our discussions or spread misinformation. Let's make sure we focus on facts and avoid jumping to conclusions based on speculation."
